moonlight-gecko.title: Moonlight Gecko
moonlight-gecko.qoute: That shining tail! Its so pretty... I want to touch it... I want to be its best friend... *gasp* I almost fell for it!
moonlight-gecko.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sector 11 and 13
 Elders Recess: Sector 7 and 8

pilot-hare.title: Pilot Hare
pilot-hare.qoute: Ooh, this is a rare one! Its warm to the touch like a little ball of sunshine! I bet this little guy just LOVES picnics!
pilot-hare.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1 and 8
 Wildspire Waste: Sector 1

dapper-coralbird.title: Dapper Coralbird
dapper-coralbird.qoute: Coralbirds only allow one chosen male into their flock. In other words, this guys the top dog- or bird.... You know what I mean!

wiggler-queen.title: Wiggler Queen
wiggler-queen.qoute: This empress of the night only appears when theres a full moon! Let's see if she'll deign to show us her royal feet... URRGH! Nope...

forest-pteryx.title: Forest Pteryx
forest-pteryx.qoute: Im so excited my hands are shaking... Its red crown...and that blue plumage! To think it was in the Ancient Forest all along!

emerald-helmcrab.title: Emerald Helmcrab
emerald-helmcrab.qoute: That avant-garde shell design, that superb silhouette and color scheme... Forget research, Im getting out my sketch book!
emerald-helmcrab.locations:
Wildspire Waste: Sector 4, 9 and 10
 Rotten Vale: Sector 9

augurfly.title: Augurfly
augurfly.qoute: They only emerge on rainy days, and its said that the day after is guaranteed to be sunny! Theyre like good weather charms!
augurfly.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 3, 5, 10, 11 and 16.
 Wildspire Waste: Sector 2, 3 and 10
 Coral Highlands: Sector 8, 11 and 14
 Rotten Vale: Sector 1 and 12

phantom-flutterfly.title: Phantom Flutterfly
phantom-flutterfly.qoute: These magnificent wings! Their rainbow glow is so alluring... I...I cant tear my eyes away from it! What a masterpiece!

prism-hercudrome.title: Prism Hercudrome
prism-hercudrome.qoute: This is the... I... How in the WORLD did you manage to... Ooh, the colors... One, two... four... Its blinding me with rainbow colors!
prism-hercudrome.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1
 Wildspire Waste: Sector 10
 Coral Highlands: Sector 11
 Rotten Vale: Sector 11
 Elders Recess: Sector 3

gold-hercudrome.title: Gold Hercudrome
gold-hercudrome.qoute: The Bringer of Light? The Bug of Brilliant Gold? I...Im speechless! My...my heart feels like its been dipped in golden bliss!
gold-hercudrome.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 6
 Wildspire Waste: Sector 5

downy-crake.title: Downy Crake
downy-crake.qoute: You caught a Downy Crake!? They've been seen on the backs of monsters before, but you're the first person EVER to catch one!
downy-crake.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1 and 8
 Wildspire Waste: Sector 1, 4 and 8
 Coral Highlands: Sector 11 and 13

bristly-crake.title: Bristly Crake
bristly-crake.qoute: Great jumping Jagras! A Bristly Crake!? The fleet-footed bird of legend...right before my very eyes! Someone pinch me...
bristly-crake.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sectors 3, 5 and 15. 
 Elders Recess: Sectors 5 and 11

giant-vigorwasp.title: Giant Vigorwasp
giant-vigorwasp.qoute: Its nectar has stronger healing properties than average, and it even releases a healing mist when its sac is ruptured!

petricanth.title: Petricanth
petricanth.qoute: Unbelievable... Youve managed to fish up the legendary, thought-to-have-gone-extinct Petricanths! I take my hat off to you!
petricanth.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sector 15
 Elders Recess: Sector 8

platinumfish.title: Platinumfish
platinumfish.qoute: Platinum-scaled cave-dwellers, theyll hightail it if you wiggle your bait! Youre going to need a lot of patience if you want to catch one.

king-marlin.title: King Marlin
king-marlin.qoute: I knew that these are known to approach the shore in search of prey, but great job catching it! And not losing your pole in the process!

gold-calappa.title: Gold Calappa
gold-calappa.qoute: Look at the shell on this thing! It makes me just wanna pick it up and scream 'big gold haul coming through'!
